ca.mcgill.ecse211.liberty

Class sensorPoller

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • ca.mcgill.ecse211.liberty.sensorPoller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class sensorPoller
extends java.lang.Thread
    This class collects data from the sample providers of the ultrasonic sensors and passes the data to the required classes by getter methods for the details, see the Software Docs
    Author:
    BillZhang
